name: streamer
content:
streamer noun [C]
(DECORATION)
Add to word list
Add to word list
a long, narrow strip of brightly coloured paper that is used as a decoration for special occasions such as parties: We decorated the office with streamers for Paul's leaving party.
Talena Sanders/Moment Open/GettyImages

streamer noun [C]
(USING INTERNET)
a person or company that streams information, music, video, etc. (= sends it over the internet) so that people can receive it as it is sent: Many streamers make their living from playing video games live online. The company ranks as the largest streamer of live media of any US media group. Compare
live streamer
software that streams data, music, video, etc. over the internet (= sends or receives it as a continuous flow): Media streamers are designed to wirelessly access a music database saved on a computer. A Hi-Fi streamer connects to your home network to play music from online services.
